mapper.insert: insert into promotion (id, kind,rule, level, amount, composition1_id,composition2_id,begin_date, end_date,voucher) values (#{id}, #{kind}, #{rule}, #{level}, #{amount}, #{composition1Id},#{composition2Id},#{beginDate}, #{endDate},#{voucher})

insert into promotion (id, `kind`,rule, level, amount, composition1_id,composition2_id,begin_date, end_date,discount) values (#{id}, #{kind}, #{rule}, #{level}, #{amount}, #{composition1Id},#{composition2Id},#{beginDate}, #{endDate},#{discount})

insert into promotion (id, `kind`,rule, level, amount, composition1_id,composition2_id,begin_date, end_date,gift_id,gift_quantity) values (#{id}, #{kind}, #{rule}, #{level}, #{amount},#{composition1Id},#{composition2Id},#{beginDate}, #{endDate}, #{giftId},#{giftQuantity})
mapper.select: select * from promotion where `kind` = '代金券' AND #{date} BETWEEN `begin_date` AND `end_date` AND (#{level} >= level OR #{amount} >= amount) ORDER BY voucher DESC limit 0,1

select * from promotion where `kind` = '代金券' AND rule = '商品组合' AND #{date} BETWEEN `begin_date` AND `end_date` AND composition1_id in (SELECT distinct pid FROM sale_sheet_content WHERE sale_sheet_id = #{sheetId}) AND composition2_id in (SELECT distinct pid FROM sale_sheet_content WHERE sale_sheet_id = #{sheetId}) ORDER BY voucher DESC limit 0,1
select * from promotion where `kind` = '折扣' AND #{date} BETWEEN `begin_date` AND `end_date` AND #{level}>=`level` ORDER BY discount limit 0,1
select * from promotion where `kind` = '赠品' AND #{date} BETWEEN `begin_date` AND `end_date` AND #{amount} >= `amount` ORDER BY amount DESC limit 0,1
